an4.103:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, kumbhā.
an4.103:4.3: Tuccho pihito, pūro vivaṭo, tuccho vivaṭo, pūro pihito—
an4.103:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.103:4.7: Tuccho pihito, pūro vivaṭo, tuccho vivaṭo, pūro pihito.
an4.103:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito?
an4.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:5.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.103:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito.
an4.103:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho pihito;
an4.103:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:6.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.103:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:6.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro vivaṭo;
an4.103:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:7.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.103:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:7.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho vivaṭo;
an4.103:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito?
an4.103:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:8.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.103:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito.
an4.103:8.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro pihito;
an4.103:8.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
